Key Match Events: The game came down to the final possession.
A brawl broke out between Rudy Gobert and Christian Braun resulting in double technical fouls.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards made a strong statement on the rivalry between Minnesota and Denver.
Edwards showed respect to Nikola Jokic, calling him the best player in the NBA.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Minnesota Timberwolves improved to 3-2 on the NBA season with their win over the Denver Nuggets.
Anthony Edwards finished with 29 points in the game.
Others: The game was a back-and-forth contest that saw Minnesota surrender their lead before going on a late run in the fourth quarter.
